item.title: All my quick hacks/tips/tricks collected in one place
item.description: Using linux systems over the years has left me with a relatively big pile of useful commands to do stuff on the command line, editor, interpreters, you name it.

item.title: Busybox: a small package with a large code base
The Many Uses of Schedulers
item.description: Let’s say you don’t have unlimited resources. Be it RAM, access to files, CPU slots, whatever you can think of. And then you have multiple workloads that will need said resources.

item.title: Risk of Trouble
item.description: Full disclosure: This game is amazing, you should try it. It’s probably on discount on GOG.

item.title: It's Alive!
item.description: Packages arrived. I finally have everything I need to start the project.

item.title: Lte Dongle
item.description: Yesterday I asked about open hardware platforms/products for modems that can connect to 3G/4G netwroks in a dongle format.

item.title: Never Ending Job Interviews
